Package com.taursys.xml.event

This package contains event related classes for Mapper XML components.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
InputListener Interface for listeners for InputEvents
ParameterListener Interface for listeners for ParameterEvents
RenderListener Interface for Listeners for RenderEvents.
TriggerListener Interface for listeners for TriggerEvents
 

Class Summary
Dispatcher Component responsible for receiving and dispatching Events.
InputEvent Event descriptor used when input is received.
ParameterEvent Event descriptor used when parameters are received.
RenderDispatcher Component responsible for receiving and dispatching RenderEvents.
RenderEvent Event descriptor used for rendering messages
TriggerEvent Event descriptor used when specific trigger(key/value) is received.
 

Exception Summary
RenderException General Exception for problems encountered in Model objects.
 

Package com.taursys.xml.event Description

This package contains event related classes for Mapper XML components. These events objects are used primarily by web and xml presentation applications.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
  • Mapper Home Page
